name: Gametator
tag_list: flash, shockwave, online, game, games, free, addicting
overview:
Gametator.com is a online game portal.

Number of casual gamers is increasing day by day. Instead of playing great video games, playing tiny but addictive online games might be more fun for lots of people. Gametator.com is a game portal of this kind.

You can play free online flash or shockwave games in a compilation of hundreds of addicting games in different genre like sports, physics, dress up, puzzle, action, arcade, multiplayer, shooting, girl, strategy games and more.

“Random game button” is another good thing about Gametator. You click that purple, cute button and voila. Its software will pick you a game for you. People who like randomness will find this useful.

Gametator.com also produces its own exclusive games. You can find all of their games at “about us” page and you can play most of them at exclusive games section.

You can use “Join Us” button to reach Gametator Facebook page. If you like this page, you will take game suggestions via Facebook. Also there are Twitter and RSS pages for similar functionality.
